mods.name: Blessing of Tartarus
mods.author: Critical_Fail
mods.description: changes Underground and Pneumonia debuffs to benefits

mods.name: Bye Suits
mods.author: Critical_Fail
mods.description: allows envirosuits to be placed in Loadout and taken down to planet for disposal (please consult readme before use)

mods.name: Dropship Plus
mods.author: Critical_Fail
mods.description: Increases Loadout and dropship inventory to 34 slots

mods.name: Golden Underoos
mods.author: Critical_Fail
mods.description: all envirouits now have 4 upgrade module slots and food slots; numerous stats improved/added to all suits

mods.name: Modules and Backpacks
mods.author: Critical_Fail
mods.description: many stat increases and changes to modules; buffalo cart has 3000kg capacity and no movement debuff, backpack stats also improved

mods.name: Outdoor Stations
mods.author: Critical_Fail
mods.description: many crafting stations can now be placed outside and are immune to weather

mods.name: Gifts of Prometheus
mods.author: Critical_Fail
mods.description: crafting improvements, bulk recipes, item stack sizes increased, Horde Mode rewards increased, deep ore veins have higher volume and faster drill speed, power network increased, workshop tools improved, firearms and bow damage increased, arrows fly faster

mods.name: WasteNot ALL
mods.author: Critical_Fail
mods.description: all metal ores now have a 1/2/3% chance to reward Exotics as secondary resource; other ores grants more of the same material

mods.name: WasteNot ULTIMATE
mods.author: Critical_Fail
mods.description: all metal ores have a 3/6/9% chance to reward Exotics as secondary resource; other ores grant more of same material

mods.name: WasteNot PlatTi
mods.author: Critical_Fail
mods.description: platinum and titanium ores have a 5/10/15% chance to reward Exotics as secondary resource; all other ores grant more of same material
